traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The leopard has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pounce
entries: If the leopard moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the leopard can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage.
